ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: I never thought I'd see the day!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I recommend getting at least 3 AAs and putting them into runspeed 3 and then working on leveling. Run 3 has saved me when I had no sow or was in places where
ygData.messageBody:
I recommend getting at least 3 AAs and putting them into runspeed 3 and then
working on leveling.
Run 3 has saved me when I had no sow or was in places where sow could not be
cast.
luv,
-Su

> Gratz on 50! I too thought I'd never see 50. Now the AA question
> rears it's ugly head. Get them now, wait for more levels, wait until
> 65! Now there's a question!
>
> Tuldayen Grimblade
> Pathfinder of Tunare
> Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
> http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750
>
>
